thread.title: Jason Simms
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Jason Simms

author: Jason Simms
title: Jason Simms
text: Caitlyn Rowlands helped us plan a trip of a lifetime. She included all our requests in our customized itinerary and even helped coordinate some special and unique requests so I could propose to my fiance. We had an amazing time and would recommend anyone looking to plan a special trip reach out to Caitlyn. Thank you Caitlyn and Costa Rican Vacations!
